summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the month of July 2018. It details various outgoing money transfers to different entities and provides a snapshot of the account's financial activity during that period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder for the financial transactions detailed in this document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Summary for July 2018
events.description: Summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Outgoing Foreign Exchange Transfer
events.description: An outgoing foreign exchange transfer of $21,115.61 to Caisse de Pargne Ile de France.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: Outgoing money transfer of $4,634.40 to American Export Company.

events.title: Multiple Outgoing Money Transfers
events.description: Multiple outgoing money transfers totaling $165,000.00 to various entities.

events.title: Ending Balance Summary
events.description: The document concludes with the ending balance of the account as of July 31, 2018.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance and transactions for July 2018.
Significant outgoing transfers include payments to various banks and companies, totaling over $165,000.
Stewart Oldfield is listed as a contact for account assistance.
The account had a beginning balance of $541,222.57 and an ending balance of $481,910.87.
Multiple transactions involve foreign exchange transfers and payments to entities in Puerto Rico and France.
